database.name: VIEW EHCM_SUSPENSION_EMP_V
database.view: SELECT perinfo.ehcm_emp_perinfo_id AS ehcm_suspension_emp_v_id, perinfo.ad_client_id, perinfo.ad_org_id, 'Y'::character AS isactive, perinfo.created, perinfo.createdby, perinfo.updated, perinfo.updatedby, perinfo.ehcm_emp_perinfo_id, concat(perinfo.value, '-', perinfo.arabicfullname) AS name FROM ehcm_emp_perinfo perinfo WHERE perinfo.status = 'I'
